version2.prototype.summary.temporal

Class TemporalSummaryCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • version2.prototype.summary.temporal.TemporalSummaryCalculator

  • public class TemporalSummaryCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    Calculates the temporal summary for given raster files using a shared stored list of files to create composites from.
    Author:
    michael.devos

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TemporalSummaryCalculator(java.lang.String projectName, java.lang.String workingDir, java.lang.String pluginName, java.io.File inRasterFile, DataDate inDataDate, int daysPerInputData, int daysPerOutputData, InterpolateStrategy intStrategy, MergeStrategy mergeStrategy, TemporalSummaryRasterFileStore fileStore)
      Creates a TemporalSummaryCalculator.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Run temporal summary calculation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TemporalSummaryCalculator

        public TemporalSummaryCalculator(java.lang.String projectName,
                                 java.lang.String workingDir,
                                 java.lang.String pluginName,
                                 java.io.File inRasterFile,
                                 DataDate inDataDate,
                                 int daysPerInputData,
                                 int daysPerOutputData,
                                 InterpolateStrategy intStrategy,
                                 MergeStrategy mergeStrategy,
                                 TemporalSummaryRasterFileStore fileStore)
        Creates a TemporalSummaryCalculator. Uses a shared TemporalSummaryRasterFileStore and breaks apart and combines files depending on the values for daysPerInputData and daysPerOutputData.
        Parameters:
        projectName - - name of current project
        workingDir - - path to current working directory
        pluginName - - name of current plugin
        inRasterFile - - File object of input raster file
        inDataDate - - DataDate object associated with inRasterFile
        daysPerInputData - - number of days the inRasterFile contains data for
        daysPerOutputData - - number of days the output raster file should contain in order to be written
        intStrategy - - interpolation strategy (method for splitting apart data files into multiple days if they are of more than 1)
        mergeStrategy - - merge strategy for combining multiple files into a single one representing more days than any single file
        fileStore - - common storage object to hold files waiting to be merged together into a single composite

    • Method Detail

      • calculate

        public DataFileMetaData calculate()
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Run temporal summary calculation.
        Returns:
        metadata of created raster file if composite created, already existing raster file if no temporal calculation needed, or null if additional files required for composite to be created
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
